title: Downward sloped LRATC, increasing returns to scale

content.question: Which of the following is a result of increasing returns to scale?

choices.label: Downward-sloping marginal physical product of labor curve
Downward-sloping long-run average total cost curve

content.answer: Downward-sloping long-run average total cost curve

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
